reasoning: Frontend-only landing page hero section using existing React/TypeScript/Material-UI stack. Multiple files will be touched but scope is contained to a single feature. No external integrations or infrastructure changes required.

scope.notes: Will likely involve: hero component file, landing page integration, styles, and possibly asset imports. Contained to frontend service.

integrations.notes: No external services. Material-UI and Emotion are already project dependencies, so no new packages needed.

infrastructure.notes: Pure frontend UI work. No backend, database, or infrastructure modifications required.

knowledge.notes: Project already uses React, TypeScript, Material-UI, and Emotion. Standard component development following existing patterns.

concerns: Dark theme styling with Material-UI theme system
Trust logo asset management and layout
risk.notes: Low-risk frontend UI work. Main concern is visual/design accuracy and responsive behavior. No security, auth, or data handling involved.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Frontend-only hero section component with no security implications or data handling. Minimal validation with visual regression testing and basic component tests if present. Main validation is design accuracy against reference image.
